#summary The document.attributes property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `document.attributes` property returns a [http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Core/core.html#ID-1780488922 NamedNodeMap] containing the attributes of this node.
